alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Western Hampden (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:18PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Tolland, northern Hartford and southwestern Hampden Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 618 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Thomaston, or 8 miles west of Bristol, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... West Hartford, Bristol, Enfield, Westfield, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, Farmington, Simsbury, Bloomfield, Avon, Longmeadow, Suffield, Ellington, Windsor Locks, Somers, Granby, East Windsor, Canton and Southwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle.
